abstract: My father was a soldier, he fought on the front lines
description: Like his father, Huong Duy Pham was also a soldier in the South Vietnam Army. But his family connections were to prove too dangerous and Huong eventually escaped by boat and made his way to Australia where he is now living with his wife and three sons. He dedicates this story to his father.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2001300; Men's voices: Digital Storytelling project (Vietnamese men); Active; 2007
